requests-gracedb Documentation
==============================

requests-gracedb provides a generic REST API client for `GraceDB`_ and similar
LIGO/Virgo API services. It uses the powerful `Requests`_ package for reliable
and high-throughput HTTP connection pooling.

Quick Start
-----------

Install with pip_::

    pip install requests-gracedb
